Home.title: Master Your Spelling Skills
Home.body: Dive into the world of words with our interactive spelling challenges. Start your journey to becoming a spelling champion today!

model.title: Start Game Confirmation
model.body: Are you sure you want to start the game?

list.title: Scores
points: Earn 1 point for each word consisting of 3 or 4 letters.
Words containing 5 or more letters yield points equal to the number of letters in the word.

list.title: Restrictions
points: Every word you form must include the designated central letter.

list.title: Benefits
points: Feel free to use any letter multiple times within a single word to craft your answers.

list.title: Time
points: Each game starts with a countdown of one minute.
Successfully spelling a correct word awards an additional 15 seconds.
The game ends when the timer expires or if a player achieves the maximum score possible.

list.title: Warning
points: Once the game starts, the language setting cannot be changed.
